section.p: During installation, adds the serviced script to the cron daily directory, /etc/cron.daily. The script includes just one entry, which specifies how serviced logs are managed.

An additional entry may be made to the /etc/cron.daily/serviced script, to manage Btrfs file systems. The additional entry is the absolute path of the management script, /opt/serviced/bin/serviced-container-cleanup.
